item.description: Decision Trees are great and are useful for a variety of tasks.

item.title: The 5 Classification Evaluation metrics every Data Scientist must know
item.description: What do we want to optimize for? Most of the businesses fail to answer this simple question.

item.title: A Generative Approach to Classification
item.description: I always get confused whenever someone talks about generative vs. discriminative classification models.

item.title: The 5 Feature Selection Algorithms every Data Scientist should know
item.description: Data Science is the study of algorithms. I grapple through with many algorithms on a day to day basis, so I thought of listing some of the most common and most used algorithms one will end up using in this new DS Algorithm series .

item.title: Object Detection: An End to End Theoretical Perspective
item.description: We all know about the image classification problem. Given an image can you find out the class the image belongs to?

item.title: Maths Beats Intuition probably every damn time
item.description: Newton once said that “God does not play dice with the universe”.
